results.title: Area outlined in blue, and on mouseover shows a name - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: I have an Excel sheet that has a block of cells with a blue outline around the block. If I click any cell within this block, there is in the upper right hand corner an icon that appears in the form of a person's head and torso. If so, the blue outline means that you or someone...
